column2: World War Hulk: Aftersmash! - Damage Control (2008) #2
column6:
While an overworked Damage Control struggles to stay on the job, the Chrysler Building is on a rampage. That's right, the actual building. Meanwhile, the all-new Goliath joins Damage Control's Search and Rescue team, and Gene repairs a broken robot who may be the secret to survival in post-World War Hulk Manhattan.,2008,2
Rated T+...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | inker:Salvador Espin | writer:Dwayne McDuffie | letterer:Nate Piekos | penciller (cover):John Romita JR.
